column1: henry taylor may| henry taylor may
column7: 2015 at his residence. he was born in waynesburg
column10: son of the late willis and flossie austin may. he was a retired airline pilot for american airlines. he was also a bush pilot in alaska
column12: flew a sea plane and was involved in search and rescue operations. he was a veteran of the u. s. marines. he is survived by one son
column21: ca and gypsy may of groveland
column24: gerald may and jimmy lee may
column26: carolyn may and betty jo may
column29: several nieces and nephews. he was preceded in death by his parents
column35: alma may and laferne may. a funeral service will be held at 11 am tuesday
column37: 2015 at morris & hislope funeral home with pastor mike newman officiating. burial will be in pilot cemetery. visitation will be after 6 pm monday at morris & hislope funeral home. morris & hislope funeral home is in charge of the arrangements.
